Make table of measures that generated scores

Source: R/er_pdf.R
er_pdf.Rd

Present each measure that generated scores on field and/or farm level in table format with scores for soil quality, water quality, climate, biodiversity and landscape given soil type.

Usage

er_pdf(
  croprotation,
  measurescores,
  dt.field.measures,
  dt.farm.measures,
  B_AREA
)

Arguments

croprotation

(boolean) is the pdf requested in function er_croprotation

measurescores

(boolean) is the pdf requested in function er_meas_scores

dt.field.measures

(datatable) field measures

dt.farm.measures

(datatable) farm measures

B_AREA

(numeric) the area of the field (m2)

On this page
